thread.title: 2 dead, 6 soldiers injured due to militant ambush in Shopian, J&K
thread.title_full: 2 dead, 6 soldiers injured due to militant ambush in Shopian, J&K

author: Abp News Bureau
title: 2 dead, 6 soldiers injured due to militant ambush in Shopian, J&K
text: ABP News Bureau & IANS | Last Updated: 23 Feb 2017 08:02 AM Srinagar: Militants ambushed security forces in Kashmirâ€™s Shopian district which claimed the lives of an Army soldier and a woman on Thursday morning. Six other armymen including two officers were also injured during the attack. "Militants ambushed and fired at the army in Chitargam village of Shopian district today morning," police said here. "The army was returning after carrying out a search operation in Kungoo village when they were ambushed by the militants," police added. One army Jawan and a woman were killed and in the attack, while six other army personnel including a lieutenant colonel and a major have been injured. The injured have been airlifted to Srinagar for treatment. Reinforcements were immediately rushed to surround the area and trace the militants. First Published: 23 Feb 2017 08:02 AM Tags:
